Plot: Marty returns to 1986 only to discover that Hill Valley has been turned into a brainwashed society led by an alternate version of Doc.
Title: Back to the Future: The Game - Episode 3, Citizen Brown
Writer: Bob Gale (characters), Bob Gale (story), Andy Hartzell, J.D. Straw, Robert Zemeckis (characters)
Actors: A.J. Locascio, Christopher Lloyd, Andrew Chaikin, Rebecca Schweitzer
